tests.title: Any expression of the data model in this section MUST be expressed in a conforming verifiable credential as defined in [VC-DATA-MODEL-2.0].

cell.rowId: Any expression of the data model in this section MUST be expressed in a conforming verifiable credential as defined in [VC-DATA-MODEL-2.0].

tests.title: If present, the id value is expected to be a URL that identifies the status information associated with the verifiable credential. It MUST NOT be the URL for the status list.

cell.rowId: If present, the id value is expected to be a URL that identifies the status information associated with the verifiable credential. It MUST NOT be the URL for the status list.

tests.title: The type property MUST be BitstringStatusListEntry.

cell.rowId: The type property MUST be BitstringStatusListEntry.

tests.title: The purpose of the status entry MUST be a string.

cell.rowId: The purpose of the status entry MUST be a string.

tests.title: The statusListIndex property MUST be an arbitrary size integer greater than or equal to 0, expressed as a string in base 10.

cell.rowId: The statusListIndex property MUST be an arbitrary size integer greater than or equal to 0, expressed as a string in base 10.

tests.title: The statusListCredential property MUST be a URL to a verifiable credential.

cell.rowId: The statusListCredential property MUST be a URL to a verifiable credential.

tests.title: When the URL is dereferenced, the resulting verifiable credential MUST have type property that includes the BitstringStatusListCredential value.

cell.rowId: When the URL is dereferenced, the resulting verifiable credential MUST have type property that includes the BitstringStatusListCredential value.

tests.title: If present, statusSize MUST be an integer greater than zero.

cell.rowId: If present, statusSize MUST be an integer greater than zero.

tests.title: If statusSize is provided and is greater than 1, then the property credentialStatus.statusMessage MUST be present.

cell.rowId: If statusSize is provided and is greater than 1, then the property credentialStatus.statusMessage MUST be present.

tests.title: The number of status messages MUST equal the number of possible values.

cell.rowId: The number of status messages MUST equal the number of possible values.

tests.title: If present, the statusMessage property MUST be an array, the length of which MUST equal the number of possible status messages indicated by statusSize.

cell.rowId: If present, the statusMessage property MUST be an array, the length of which MUST equal the number of possible status messages indicated by statusSize.

tests.title: statusMessage MAY be present if statusSize is 1, and MUST be present if statusSize is greater than 1.

cell.rowId: statusMessage MAY be present if statusSize is 1, and MUST be present if statusSize is greater than 1.
cell.skipMessage: No greater than 1 statusSize property included.

err.message: No greater than 1 statusSize property included.

tests.title: If the statusMessage array is present, each element MUST contain the two properties "status" and "message".

cell.rowId: If the statusMessage array is present, each element MUST contain the two properties "status" and "message".

tests.title: If present, the "statusReference" value MUST be a URL or an array of URLs [URL] which dereference(s) to material related to the status.

cell.rowId: If present, the "statusReference" value MUST be a URL or an array of URLs [URL] which dereference(s) to material related to the status.

tests.title: When a status list verifiable credential is published, it MUST be a conforming document, as defined in [VC-DATA-MODEL-2.0].

cell.rowId: When a status list verifiable credential is published, it MUST be a conforming document, as defined in [VC-DATA-MODEL-2.0].

tests.title: The verifiable credential that contains the status list MAY express an id property that matches the value specified in statusListCredential for the corresponding BitstringStatusListEntry.
The verifiable credential that contains the status list MUST express a type property that includes the BitstringStatusListCredential value.

cell.rowId: The verifiable credential that contains the status list MUST express a type property that includes the BitstringStatusListCredential value.

tests.title: The type of the credential subject, which is the status list, MUST be BitstringStatusList.

cell.rowId: The type of the credential subject, which is the status list, MUST be BitstringStatusList.

tests.title: The value of the purpose property of the status entry, statusPurpose, MUST be one or more strings.

cell.rowId: The value of the purpose property of the status entry, statusPurpose, MUST be one or more strings.

tests.title: The encodedList property of the credential subject MUST be a Multibase-encoded base64url (with no padding) [RFC4648] representation of the GZIP-compressed [RFC1952] bitstring values for the associated range of verifiable credential status values.

cell.rowId: The encodedList property of the credential subject MUST be a Multibase-encoded base64url (with no padding) [RFC4648] representation of the GZIP-compressed [RFC1952] bitstring values for the associated range of verifiable credential status values.

tests.title: The uncompressed bitstring MUST be at least 16KB in size.

cell.rowId: The uncompressed bitstring MUST be at least 16KB in size.

tests.title: The bitstring MUST be encoded such that the first index, with a value of zero (0), is located at the left-most bit in the bitstring and the last index, with a value of one less than the length of the bitstring (bitstring_length - 1), is located at the right-most bit in the bitstring.

cell.rowId: The bitstring MUST be encoded such that the first index, with a value of zero (0), is located at the left-most bit in the bitstring and the last index, with a value of one less than the length of the bitstring (bitstring_length - 1), is located at the right-most bit in the bitstring.

tests.title: MUST verify a valid "BitstringStatusListCredential" with "revocation" status purpose
MUST verify a valid "BitstringStatusListCredential" with "suspension" status purpose
MUST fail to verify a VC with invalid "credentialStatus.statusListCredential"
MUST fail to verify a VC with invalid "credentialStatus.type"
MUST fail to verify a revoked status list credential
MUST fail to verify a suspended status list credential
